creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: pounded indigo; open front; neck piece has ribbon braid, 10" longer on PR; four woven ties on bottom half; yoke has red silk embroidered strips with birds, fish, animals; sleeve on PL has 6-1/2" x 6" soil embroidery sewn on; two large striped dragons facing each other aggressively, surrounded by little animals and a leaping man; red, blue, green, pink; sleeve on PR has two dragons facing front and smiling, surrounded by the sun, man in the moon, other figures with male and female, sequins; adjacent bands have exotic embroidered creatures; these sleeve patches seem clearly to be illustrating a story
title: Jacket
